explanation: [0-0] A pair of hands is using a sewing machine to attach a yellow and pink trim to a purple fabric. The left hand holds the trim, while the right hand is placed on the fabric. The sewing machine is white with red handles.

[0-4] The hands skillfully use the sewing machine to fix the trim to the fabric, folding the trim and pressing it down with the hand when sewing to the corner of the fabric, turning the fabric, and continuing sewing.
